TBAS BLAST N

You can set:

runtime_ =
use_epa_ = 1 or 0, this restricts what databases cna be used, unaligned cant be used for EPA
nucleotid_db_ = allowed values: 5_8S; nuclsu; nucssu; mitssu; rpb1; rpb2; unaligned_its; unaligned_lsu; unaligned_ssu; unaligned_mitssu;
unaligned_rpb1; unaligned_rpb2
